title: Nutritional Supplements | Chiropractor in Lake Orion, MI | Caruso Chiropractic
description: Nutritional Supplements in Lake Orion, MI. Caruso Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in Lake Orion serving all of your needs. Call us today at (248) 693-4800 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: What does nutrition have to do with chiropractic care? The optimal goal for chiropractic care is to help patients achieve total body health and balance, and as part of that goal we provide specific recommendations on nutritional supplements and healthy food choices. Nutritional counseling by our experienced chiropractic WELLNESS professionals can assist a patient on their return to optimal health. Do you know which supplements and vitamins are good for you or what your body is deficient in? Do you know how these supplements and vitamins interact with one another? At our chiropractic clinic, we can provide each patient with a structured nutritional program that is based on their individual needs.
